project_abstract.cdata: The China Second Shandong Environment Project's objective is to improve the environmental conditions in participating municipalities and counties through a package of priority interventions including upgrading and development o f waste water collection and treatment facilities, river embankment rehabilitation, solid waste management, water supply improvements, industrial pollution monitoring, and enhancement o f the financial performance and efficiency o f key urban environmental service agencies. The project has the following four components: (a) wastewater collection network and treatment facilities in Gaomi, Huantai, Qixia, Weifang, Weihai, Yantai and Zaozhuang, with associated river embankment rehabilitation in Qixia, Weifang and Zaozhuang, and development of a pilot septic tank management system in Yantai co-financed by GEF; (b) solid waste management in Heze and Rizhao; (c) water supply improvements in Gaomi and Huantai; and (d) institutional development and capacity building for utilities, Environmental Protection Bureaus (EPBs) and decision makers.

P077752.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>山东省城建环保二期项目</ProjectName><ShortName></ShortName><ProjectAbstract>该项目旨在帮助山东省以可持续的方式改善环境，有九个山东省的市、县参与项目。项目支持的具体内容包括在高密、桓台、栖霞、潍坊、威海、烟台、枣庄等地进行污水收集系统和污水处理设施建设，在栖霞、潍坊、枣庄进行河岸堤坝修复重建；在菏泽、日照建设新的垃圾处理处置设施；在高密、桓台建设水厂、输水管道和配送系统，对控制系统进行升级改造。世行还将帮助省环保局加强能力建设，培训省和地方政府决策者和项目业主。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
